original_title: Higher Education - The Complete Wakeboard Instructional
overview: From the makers of Class In Session, Bump Films brings you the newest DVD to help you improve your wakeboarding way!  Higher Education teaches you every aspect of wakeboarding. The best pro riders and instructors in the sport give you the skills you need to be up and ripping in no time.  Instructors break down each trick for you and you get to see slow motion footage of top pros from different angles performing the tricks.
title: Higher Education - The Complete Wakeboard Instructional
